product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Sheath Folder Knife & Survivial Bracelet Set - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Head out on an epic adventure with the Gerber Bear Grylls Sheath Folder Knife and Survival Bracelet set. Knife features a partially serrated blade that is made of high carbon stainless steel for excellent edge retention. Lock Back feature locks the blade securely in place when open; dual-sided thumb stud offers easy one-handed opening. Ergonomically shaped, textured rubber handle maximizes comfort and grip. Survival bracelet can be used to hang food, build a primitive bow, lash together sticks for shelter and for many, many other uses. Includes 12 ft. of high-strength paracord woven into a bracelet that you can wear while exploring the outdoors. Bracelet features an integrated emergency whistle for signaling for help and alerting others of danger. Overstock.
short_description: Head out on an epic adventure with the Gerber Bear Grylls Sheath Folder Knife and Survival Bracelet set.
